description: Plan your next nature adventure with these great hikes near Seattle!

Visit the biggest tourist attraction in Seattle! Pike Place is known for its vibrant atmosphere, diverse fresh produce, crafts, unique shops, providing a rich cultural and culinary experience for both visitors and locals.
Go to Gas Works and enjoy the view of Seattle with your friends!
UW recreation offers health and wellness classes including climbing courses, backpacking, dance classes, and intramural sports.
